result.eng: The parliament will have the right to amend the budget.
result.ga: beidh de cheart ag an pharlaimint an buiséad a leasú
result.orig: beidh de cheart ag an pharlaimint an buiséad a leasú

result.eng: We'll have to wait until Budget Day.
